snippet: A new health policy that would make condoms available in the district’s high schools is up for a vote on Wednesday night.
abstract: Boston School Committee is set to vote on new health policy that would make condoms available in district's high schools, bringing Boston schools in line with New York and Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: A new health policy that would make condoms available in the district’s high schools is up for a vote on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Board to Vote on Condoms in Boston Schools
headline.print_headline: Board to Vote on Policy to Offer Condoms and Sex Education at High Schools in Boston
